column1: Component specification schema (YAML) - use as deterministic model input

component:
  id: api-orders-v1
  type: api  # enum: api, microservice, db, queue, etc
  provider: generic  # or aws/gcp/azure
  config:
    image: registry.example.com/orders:1.4.2
    replicas: 4
    resources:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1024Mi
    env:
      - name: DB_HOST
        ref: postgres-orders
    timeouts:
      request_timeout_ms: 800
      connect_timeout_ms: 100
    retries:
      policy: exponential_backoff
      max_attempts: 3
    circuit_breaker:
      failure_threshold: 0.05
      recovery_window_s: 60
  telemetry:
    metrics: true
    tracing: sample_rate: 0.1
  sla:
    slo_latency_p95_ms: 300
    slo_error_rate: 0.01
  dependencies:
    - postgres-orders
    - redis-cache
  failure_modes:
    - name: db_connection_spike
      trigger: increased_latency_on_dep
      severity: high
      deterministic: true
  tags: ["payments", "v1"]
